sourceMeaningMnemonic: You keep some <radical>private</radical> <radical>spoon</radical>s on the <radical>moon</radical> and they give you a special <kanji>ability</kanji>. It's the ability to predict the future! The moon spoons reflect the knowledge of time and space into your brain. Now that's a cool ability!
meaningInfo: I wish I had this kind of ability... maybe I'll go up to the moon and try to steal your spoons.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>ability</kanji> to predict the future makes you famous and now everyone knows your name: <reading>No</reading>stradamus (<ja>のう</ja>)! And now that people know about your name and special ability, everyone will love you!
readingInfo: Oh, you thought I was talking about that old Nostradamus, who also had the ability to predict things? Nah, you're way cooler than him.
